messages.form_label_name: Please fill  the official name of the organization/individual  for Bystack Block Producer:
messages.form_label_name_des: Name will be displayed in the voting page
messages.form_label_location: Please indicate the location of your headquarters:
messages.form_label_btm_des: Balance should be more than 1,000,000 BTM
messages.form_label_sn: Please list all your media accounts or community channels
messages.form_label_sn_des: At least one media account(Weibo/Twitter/Telegram channel/Medium/Steem) or community channel(Wechat /Reddit/ Forum/Telegram group/Facebook grouop)
messages.form_label_plan: Please fill your promotion strategy and plan for Block Producer election:
messages.form_label_plan_des: Please fill the reliable marketing strategy and plan
messages.form_label_wish: Please fill your vision about Bystack network and your election manifesto for Block Producer
messages.form_label_wish_des: This will be displayed on the voting site as your masternode candidate manifesto
messages.form_label_reward: How much will you distribute to your voters?
messages.form_label_reward_des: 0%~100%,Allocation will be displayed in the voting page
messages.form_label_logo: Please upload the LOGO of the organization/individual for Bystack Block Producer:
